title: Which of the following does NOT help to protect against session hijacking and fixation attacks?

choices.a: Use SSL and set the $secure cookie parameter to true.
choices.b: Set the session.use_only_cookies php.ini parameter to 1.
choices.c: Set the session.cookie_lifetime php.ini parameter to 0.
choices.d: Protect against XSS vulnerabilities in the application.
choices.e: Rotate the session id on successful login and logout using session_regenerate_id()
